q:
In Databricks, you are working on the Delta Lake and Delta Engine. If you are required to create a table named organization that contains four columns named id (long), date (string), location (string), and company (string), then which of the SQL queries must be executed such that only the companies with the dates post 01/01/2001 should be inserted into the table:
Queries
1.

CREATE TABLE organization(
    id LONG NOT NULL,
    date STRING,
    location STRING,
    description STRING, ADD CONSTRAINT dateWithinRange CHECK (date > '2001-01-01');
) USING DELTA;

2.

DELTA TABLE organization(
    id LONG NOT NULL,
    date STRING,
    location STRING,
    description STRING, DELTA ADD CONSTRAINT dateWithinRange CHECK (date > '2001-01-01');
);

3.

CREATE TABLE organization(
    id LONG NOT NULL,
    date STRING,
    location STRING,
    description STRING) USING DELTA; ALTER table organization ADD CONSTRAINT dateWithinRange CHECK (date > '2001-01-01');

4.

DELTA TABLE organization(
    id LONG NOT NULL,
    date STRING,
    location STRING,
    description STRING, CONSTRAINT dateWithinRange CHECK (date > '2001-01-01');
);
